class Solution:
    def shortestDistanceAfterQueries(self, n, queries):
        par = [0] * 200005
        for i in range(n): par[i] = i
        ret = []
        def p(u):
            if par[u] == u: return u
            par[u] = p(par[u])
            return par[u]

        c = n-1
        for l, r in queries:
            r -= 1
            if l >= r: continue
            while not p(l) == p(r):
                fl = p(l)
                fln = p(1+fl)
                par[fl], l, c = fln, fln, c-1
            ret.append(c)
        return ret
